attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: bring back betty boothroyed as speaker for the house of commons she did a fantastic job and mr martin who is the leader at the moment cannot do the job he was given hes too slow and cannot bring the house to attention, come back betty and bring the house of commons in order

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
